titleStmt.title: Thursday, February 23. 1659. Resolved upon the question by the Parliament, that all the militias in the respective counties, and the powers given to them, be and are hereby revoked, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Streater, and John Macock, Printers to the Parliament,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
An Order of Parliament revoking the powers given to the militia.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
